mapper.select: SELECT m.identify, m.`Name` name, m.EName AS ename, m.Director director, m.Actor actor, m.Intro intro, m.price, m.Mins mins, m.mediaid, CASE WHEN ( SELECT round(ifnull(AVG(score), 0), 1) FROM score s WHERE s.movieid = m.id ) >= m.Score THEN ( SELECT round(ifnull(AVG(score), 0), 1) FROM score s WHERE s.movieid = m.id ) ELSE round(m.score,1) END score, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM favorite f WHERE smartcardid = #{smartcardid} AND f.pid = m.id ) isFavorite, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM score s WHERE s.smartcardid = #{smartcardid} AND s.movieid = m.id ) isRated, CASE WHEN ( SELECT score FROM score s WHERE s.smartcardid = #{smartcardid} AND s.movieid = m.id ) is null then 0 ELSE (SELECT score FROM score s WHERE s.smartcardid = #{smartcardid} AND s.movieid = m.id )END rating, (select count(1) from cms_praise_relationship where smartcardid=#{smartcardid} and programeid=#{pid}) as isPraised, (select count(1) from cms_praise_relationship where programeid=#{pid}) as praiseNum, (select count(1) from watchrecord where programeid=#{pid}) as watchNum, CASE WHEN (select mediaid from cms_movie_preview where movieid=#{pid}) is null then '' ELSE (select mediaid from cms_movie_preview where movieid=#{pid})END preview FROM movie m WHERE m.id=#{pid}
select id,name,identify,actors as actor,casttime,MediaID mediaid from preview where status=1 order by id desc limit 8
